bug.author: tarepan
bug.summary: PR template requires label addition to non-permitted author
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
New PR template requires Add labels and milestones, but it is impossible because non-maintainer author do not have labelling permission. <denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Try to follow below PR template instruction as non-maintainer. <denchmark-code> - [ ] Add labels and milestones (and optionally projects) to the PR so it can be classified; _Bugfixes should be including in bug-fix release milestones (m.f.X) and features should be included in (m.X.b) releases._ </denchmark-code>
non-maintainer author do not have permission, so can do nothing (no label setup icon, like below image). <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19833110/98325468-3e438c80-2032-11eb-8e80-5ed721ea0593.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
Have labelling permission, so PR author can label the PR. <denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
master latest (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/pytorch-lightning/commit/5e09fd31e9850902fc0a79e92aaba7b80dae1944>5e09fd3</denchmark-link> ) <denchmark-h:h3>Additional context</denchmark-h>
This template description is introduced in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/pytorch-lightning/pull/4523>#4523</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Hey <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tarepan>@tarepan</denchmark-link> , Don't worry, we added this line to make sure Pytorch Ligthning Core Team add labels on every PRs. Best regards, Thomas Chaton.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/tchaton>@tchaton</denchmark-link> this is in the section for reviewers so do not worry... :] but maybe we should write it there that the before submit is for author and PR review is for reviewers only
